Contact Details: HESA, 95 Promenade, Cheltenham GL50 1HZ Email official.statistics@hesa.ac.uk  T +44 (0) 1242 211 494
Description: A wide range of tables and charts about staff employed in higher education.
Name: Higher Education Staff Data
Notes: Open Data source available, so this is potentially an easy win dataset. May fit better with an Education family
Route from landing page to data: Data on this page identified via a links towards bottom of page under table column heading table/chart.  Once relevant table link clicked, a data table is presented on anew page, at the bottom of this table is a link to the actual data in CSV form titled Download table (csv) | Download source data (csv).
Sizing Notes: As far as I can see relevant tables for disabilities seem to be; Table 5: HE academic staff by disability and academic employment function 2014/15 to 2017/18 and when next clicked to reveal further tables, Table 20: HE full-time academic staff by HE provider and contract salary 2014/15 to 2017/18 and Table 16: HE full-time academic staff by cost centre and contract salary 2014/15 to 2017/18. Simple table structure and dimensions. CSV format downloadable.
